title: Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10)
content:
Child Protective Forms (Family Court Act Article 10)

State Regulations

Form 10-1 - Order directing temporary removal of child (before filing of petition)

Form 10-1a - Notice (temporary removal of child and right to hearing)

Form 10-1b - Order of investigation

Form 10-1c - Application for pre-petition temporary removal of child(ren) from home

Form 10-2 - Order on application for temporary removal of child after petition filed

Form 10-2a - Order for services

Form 10-2b - Order terminating remand

Form 10-3 - Order directing medical examination

Form 10-4 - Application for return of child temporarily removed from home

Form 10-5 - Order on application for return of child temporarily removed from home

Form 10-6 - Petition (child neglect)

Form 10-7 - Petition (child abuse, severe abuse or repeated abuse)

Form 10-7a - Summons (child abuse case)

Form 10-7c - Summons (child neglect proceeding)

Form 10-7d - Notice to non-respondent parent(s) of pending child protective proceeding

Form 10-8 - Order (adjournment in contemplation of dismissal)

Form 10-8a - Application to restore case adjourned in contemplation of dismissal to calendar

Form 10-9 - Determination upon fact-finding (neglect) (severe abuse) (repeated abuse)

Form 10-10 - Order of fact-finding and disposition (and permanency hearing)

Form 10-11a - Motion to terminate placement

Form 10-11b - Affidavit in support of motion to terminate placement

Form 10-12 - Order on motion to terminate placement

Form 10-13 - Petition (violation of order of disposition)

Form 10-13a - Affidavit in support of motion for violation of disposition

Form 10-14 - Order on petition for violation of order of disposition

Form 10-15 - Petition for release of responsibility under order of placement

Form 10-16 - Order on petition for violation of order of disposition (Rescinded)

Form 10-17 - Motion for order approving relative as foster parent

Form 10-17a - Affidavit in support of motion for order approving relative as foster parent

Form 10-18 - Order on motion for approval of relative as foster parent

Form 10-19 - Order of transfer or referral to district attorney

Form 10-25 - Petition (for visitation)

Form 10-26 - Order (visitation)

Form 10-27 - Petition for extension of supervision

Form 10-28 - Order determining on petition for extension of supervision

Form 10-29 - Order on application for access to child(ren) and/or home-before petition filed

Form 10-29a - Application for order for access to child(ren) and/or home-before petition filed

Form 10-29b - Report after order for pre-petition access to child(ren) and/or home

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
